import Card from "./comment-card" import "./comment.css" const Comment = ({ device }) => { let commentHistory = [] fetch('http://localhost:3001/comment') .then(res => res.json()) .then(obj => console.log(obj)) .catch(err => console.log(err)) const onSubmit = () => { const author = document.getElementById('author').value; const content = document.getElementById('content').value; if (author && content) { fetch('http://localhost:3001/comment', { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-type": "application/json; charset=UTF-8" }, body: JSON.stringify({ author, content }), }) .then(response => response.json()) .then(obj => { console.log(obj) window.location.reload(false) }) .catch(err => console.log('Error at line 22', err)); } } return
